name: better-auth-paymongo
description: PayMongo payment gateway plugin for Better-Auth with subscription management, add-ons, and usage-based billing

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/client.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap=external --external nanostores && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap=external --external ./client --external better-auth --external zod && bun build src/react.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap=external --external better-auth-paymongo/client --external react --external @nanostores/react --external nanostores
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && bun run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && bun run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && bun run release

author: darkziah
